item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a trained statistician with a strong flair for coding. My current programming language of choice is Python. While Rust is the most appealing to me. I am working as a data scientist and/or machine learning engineer. About the Page I was inspired by a post form https://juliasilge.com/. The logo’s foundation are the greek letters alpha, gamma and sigma. This is a hugo website. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
